name: vscode-sqlfluff
description: A linter and auto-formatter for SQLfluff, a popular linting tool for SQL and dbt.

sqlfluff.config.description: Specify an additional configuration file that overrides the standard configuration files.

key.markdownDescription: The key for the environment variable.

value.markdownDescription: The value for the environment variable.

sqlfluff.dialect.description: The dialect of SQL to lint.

sqlfluff.excludeRules.description: Exclude specific rules. The excludedRules from the global settings and workspace settings are combined.

sqlfluff.ignoreLocalConfig.description: Ignore config files in default search path locations. Can be used with config to only reference the custom config file.

sqlfluff.ignoreParsing.description: Determines if the sql linter should ignore parsing errors.

sqlfluff.rules.description: Narrow the search to only specific rules. The rules from the global settings and workspace settings are combined.

sqlfluff.shell.markdownDescription: Set the shell for the child process. This can be set to false (limited shell features), true (shell features such as the `dir` command), or the path to the shell executable.

sqlfluff.suppressNotifications.description: Hide notification messages. The output channel will still be populated.

sqlfluff.workingDirectory.markdownDescription: Set the working directory for the `sqlfluff lint` and `sqlfluff fix` commands. Use an absolute path (can use variables if necessary). This defaults to the root path of the workspace. This setting should only be changed if absolutely necessary.

sqlfluff.codeActions.excludeRules.worksp.markdownDescription: Determines if the `Exclude Rule <rule> from Workspace Settings` code action is enabled.

sqlfluff.codeActions.excludeRules.global.markdownDescription: Determines if the `Exclude Rule <rule> from Global Settings` code action is enabled.

sqlfluff.codeActions.noqa.markdownDescription: Set the rules that will not show the `noqa` code actions. Set this to `false` to disable all `noqa` code actions.

key.markdownDescription: The key for the environment variable.

value.markdownDescription: The value for the environment variable.

sqlfluff.env.environmentVariables.markdownDescription: Set the environment variables for the linter and formatter.

sqlfluff.env.customDotEnvFiles.description: Load the .env file from the specified paths.

sqlfluff.env.useDotEnvFile.description: Load the .env file from the working directory.

sqlfluff.format.arguments.markdownDescription: This is useful for setting extra arguments for the `sqlfluff fix` command.

sqlfluff.format.enabled.description: Determines if the document formatter is enabled.

language.markdownDescription: The language to enable formatting for.

contextMenuFormatOptions.markdownDescription: Show a SQLFluff option in the context menu.

preserveLeadingWhitespace.markdownDescription: Only works with `Format on Selection`. Preserve whitespace based on the first line of the selection.

sqlfluff.format.languages.description: The languages formatting is enabled for.

sqlfluff.experimental.format.executeInTe.markdownDescription: Determines if the `sqlfluff fix` command overwrites the file contents instead of this extension. You should not change the file contents while formatting is occurring if this is enabled. May lead to problems if `editor.formatOnSave = true`. This allows formatting to work when the templater is set to dbt. This can help solve [Mojibake](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mojibake) issues.

sqlfluff.linter.arguments.markdownDescription: This is useful for setting extra arguments for the `sqlfluff lint` command.

sqlfluff.linter.delay.markdownDescription: Set the delay (milliseconds) before running the linter when using `sqlfluff.linter.run = 'onType'`.

sqlfluff.linter.diagnosticSeverity.markdownDescription: Set the default diagnostic severity of the linting results.

rule.markdownDescription: The specific rule for the diagnostic severity.

severity.markdownDescription: Set the diagnostic severity for the given rule.

sqlfluff.linter.diagnosticSeverityByRule.markdownDescription: Set the diagnostic severity of individual linting results.

sqlfluff.linter.lintEntireProject.markdownDescription: Determines if the linter will lint the workspaces on startup and configuration changes. Does not work with `dbt-core-interface`.

sqlfluff.linter.languages.description: The languages linting is enabled for.

sqlfluff.linter.run.description: Determines if the linter runs on save, on type, or disabled.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Run the linter when the document is typed in. Does not work when the templater is set to dbt.
Run the linter when the document is saved.

sqlfluff.dbtInterface.enabled.markdownDescription: Enable this if `dbt-core-interface` is installed. This disables all other options except for `sqlfluff.config`.

sqlfluff.dbtInterface.host.description: The host for the dbt-interface server.

sqlfluff.dbtInterface.port.description: The port for the dbt-interface server.

scripts.compile: rimraf out && tsc -p ./ && npm run postbuild
